comments.body: how about some short go style names? e.g. rcs and g. Would make it much easier to read.

> how about some short go style names? e.g. rcs and g. Would make it much easier to read.

I don't find that shorter names do much other than make me keep referring to the method declaration. If @lavalamp also wants short names, I'll rename.
It doesn't look like go code. But I can live with that, just a matter of taste. There are more important topics.
